    • getAllSerializableFields

      public static List<Field> getAllSerializableFields​(Object object, Class<?>... excludeClasses)
      Parameters:
      object - non-nullable object
      excludeClasses - list of classes whose fields are not returned
      Returns:
      an array of Fields (possibly empty)

    • isNotTransient

      public static boolean isNotTransient​(Field field)
      Parameters:
      field - Field
      Returns:
      true if the field does not have 'transient' modifier

    • isNotConstantField

      public static boolean isNotConstantField​(Field field)
      Parameters:
      field - Field
      Returns:
      true if the field does not have 'static' and 'final' modifiers

    • readFieldValue

      public static Object readFieldValue​(Object object, Field field)
      Parameters:
      object - target for read
      field - object field
      Returns:
      field value
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - if the value cannot be read form the object field

    • invokeConstructor

      public static <M> M invokeConstructor​(Class<M> aClass, Object... args)
      Type Parameters:
      M - generic type
      Parameters:
      aClass - Class for instantiation
      Returns:
      new instance of the class
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - on instantiation errors
